data.name: The Pedestrian Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy this behind the scenes Digital Artbook of The Pedestrian.

This artbook takes you through the entirety of The Pedestrian's artwork, developed over the course of 6 years. Throughout the artbook, we provide context on our process and thoughts at that particular moment in time.

This Digital Artbook contains 35 pages in PDF format.


Where can I find The Pedestrian Artbook after purchase?
Right-Click on "The Pedestrian" in your library, then, "Manage">"Browse local files".
The Artbook is then located in "ThePedestrianArtbook" folder.
